main event: On December 19, 1952, personnel from Andersen AFB in Guam reported sightings of unidentified flying objects traveling at high speeds.
interesting points: The objects were described as silvery metallic and cylindrical in shape,Three witnesses reported observing a trailing flame behind the objects,Reports indicated the objects moved at speeds considerably faster than conventional aircraft,Multiple sightings occurred of similar objects in the same vicinity,One sighting lasted approximately 30 seconds before the object disappeared into the clouds.
witness description: ground crew personnel and pilots from the 54th Strategic Reconnaissance Squadron
